article.headline: Rhode Island 78, Fordham 58
article.story: KINGSTON, R.I. -- Anthony Malhoit scored a career-high 21 points and Orion Outerbridge notched a double-double, leading Rhode Island over Fordham 78-58 on Wednesday night. Outerbridge, who scored 15 points and grabbed 13 boards for his fifth double-double of the season, also blocked three shots -- that put him over 100 for his career. Mike Powell added 11 points and Jonathan Holton pulled down 12 boards for Rhode Island (7-23, 4-11 Atlantic 10 Conference), which has now won two straight games. Rhode Island led from wire to wire, opening on a 20-6 run for a 14-point halftime lead. The squad outscored Fordham 43-37 in the second half to seal it, avenging a loss at Fordham on Jan. 18. Branden Frazier had 20 points to lead Fordham (10-18, 3-12) and Devon McMillan added 10. Fordham has lost seven of its last eight contests.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
